website_summaries.verdict: Wipes are convenient to use on areas of the body tough to reach with sprays. Reasonable price.
pros: Lower price per wipe than most other options
Wipes remain moist for hours if you don't use the entire one initially

customer_reviews.title: It’s been such a problem that I normally use heavy sprays like deeps woods OFF
customer_reviews.text: I’m that person who always gets eaten alive by mosquitoes. It’s been such a problem that I normally use heavy sprays like deeps woods OFF. I got really tired of how greasy and stinky these sprays were. So I tried these wipes and LOVE them. They have a pleasant scent and are not greasy at all. I went outside at 7:15am on a muggy overcast but warm morning to do yard work - prime conditions for skeeters - and am pleased to say I got ZERO bites!
customer_reviews.author: lthornton79

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 10 month old.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our family trip to Yosemite this last weekend, the wipes were so easy to use, the scent was quite strong at first but they worked so well my 10 month old did not get bit once. I applied once in the morning and once in the afternoon, 1 wipe each for the whole baby face, head, neck, forearms and feet. I only lightly wiped his face and he did not have a reaction or he wasn't sensitive to the wipes which i'm super happy about. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It truly works
customer_reviews.text: We have the most vicious mosquitoes in So Cal day and night! If I want to enjoy the outdoors, I spray myself with Cutter and burn my mosquito repelling torches. The insects really do stay away with this product. When I forget to spray it on, they feast on my blood. The Skinsations has a mostly clean scent; however the bug repellent odor is definitely present. I figure it’s better than having dozens of itchy bites for a week! The texture of the formula is similar to spray on sunscreen. Just spray a light mist and rub it in. I recommend doing this outside because it gets everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eli-Ana

customer_reviews.title: These work really well for young children you don't want to spray
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to spray my kids with aerosol deet every day we go outside so these are a great alternative. I can wipe their neck, arms and legs really quick and they run off to play. The smell is honestly great compared to other products on the market. After it's applied you can't even feel it on your skin. I normally only use one wipe per day. I wipe down both of my kids and then whatever is left on the wipe I use on myself. I wouldn't trust these in the deep woods but for everyday playing in the front yard these are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for me, 3 stars for my wife, so 4 stars works. I love it. I put this on before working outside and it works great. Mosquitos are numerous enough to blot out the sun on my property so this is a must. I have noticed that you need to spray it directly on every inch of skin. you cant just spray in the general area and expect a full forcefield, they will find any place not directly sprayed. My wife attracts mosquitos from miles away so it doesn't work as good on her but she still uses it because a few bites is better than several bites.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: No mosquito free radius
customer_reviews.text: It seems like this protects the skin but only the parts you actually wipe. It doesn't not protect you from mosquito bites through clothes. I went for a walk mistakingly thinking of I wipe down the exposed skin, the covered skin would be okay because the scent would give me a bit of a mosquito free radius. I was wrong. After a 20 minute walk my exposed skin was fine but my covered legs and back got 5 mosquito bites. I'm going to stick with the spray.
customer_reviews.author: SMFE

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant but Not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: These Cutter mosquito wipes arrived on time and in perfect condition. They are very convenient to use, you can take them everywhere in your purse or pocket. The scent is much more pleasant than other insect repellents. However, it does not last very long and the effectiveness goes away almost instantly. The very reason why it’s non greasy is why it is so volatile. I would not recommend this unless you’re instantly passing through mosquitos. It would be no good for any sustained outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought a pack of these with me to Yellowstone and Jackson Hole during peak mosquito season and they worked perfectly! You can pack them in your carry-on when flying! I love having an easy to use wipe that I can be super specific with (like between my toes, my neck, etc). They aren't greasy or sticky, don't dissolve my nail polish, don't make my hair gross, and smell minty and fresh. I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Way better than greasy sprays
customer_reviews.text: I hate oily bug sprays and even the ones marketed as “dry” are a mess. These wipes are not just easier to pack, the convenience of using and disposing of wipes is a major bonus. I used this at a weekend retreat in the woods, and although I SAW tons of bugs flying around, I didn’t FEEL any bugs or end up with any bites. Other people who had big sprays were begging me to share!
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Smells great while protecting
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I hate about OFF is that it stinks! When I found this cutter product I have never looked elsewhere. It smells so good I had a guy ask me what I was wearing because it smelled so good. LOL. Needless to say he was surprised when I told him it was bug repellant.
customer_reviews.author: twins mom 22

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for bug spray!
customer_reviews.text: We have been eaten up by small mosquitos this season but my husband hates the smell of bug spray. So I bought these and they smell more like lotion, he loves them! One wipe is enough to cover your arms and legs, but would recommend at least two wipes if you really want superb coverage. It's not oily but also doesn't leave your skin feeling dry either. It definitely does the job at keeping the bugs away too, so we can go back to enjoying our backyard in the evenings!
customer_reviews.author: imasurfgrl

customer_reviews.title: It worked great, though the mosquito population in the area seemed ...
customer_reviews.text: Used on a recent outdoor trip in Puerto Rico. It worked great, though the mosquito population in the area seemed somewhat limited to start. For a full grown adult, you may need ~1.5 sheets per application if you have more exposed skin (shorts, tank top), or just 1 if less exposed skin (jeans, jacket). Great for trips/airplanes. (Sprays are fine, but a lot can be wasted if you don't aim well, or apply too much). Resealable package is handy. No sure how moist it will stay as it sits on the shelf for the next few months, but hopefully it'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Arpit Patel

customer_reviews.title: Worked on my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I used these wipes in Cuba on my toddler son and he avoided mosquito bites except for one on the top of his ear, where I may have forgotten to apply the repellent. I was inconsistent about applying the repellent on myself, and I left Cuba with a half dozen large mosquito bites. Judging by my son's success, I think these work well and I am pleased with the amount of DEET in these, not too much, and not too little.
customer_reviews.author: Emily F.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and works
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are perfect for air travel as you can pack them in a carry-on bag. I brought this on a trip to Europe and they easily fit in my day pack. I also purchased more for my upcoming trip to Hawaii. Fragrance is light (lighter than a typical bug-spray). Sometimes the aerosol sprays give me a headache so these wipes are a better choice. Repels bugs.
customer_reviews.author: tortiecats

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic repellent wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Love love these wipes. I can make a single wipe work for my arms, legs, face, neck, and upper chest, and I’m a plus size girl weighing roughly 225 pounds. Mosquitoes no longer keep me inside. No sticky or greasy residue, quick drying, light scent on skin but not overwhelming. My boyfriend and I love to play frisbee in his yard, which is near a river. I never get any bites! Works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: MaryJ_RN

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Really handy. The only thing I did not like is that the whole stack pulls out even if you try to follow the "pull at a diagonal" instructions . So they have been dropped several times. They seem to work well, so not smell awful, and are easy to apply to children.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My little one still had bug bites
customer_reviews.text: These wipes work somewhat okay. My little one still gets mosquito bites. Not as bad if he didn’t have the wipes on but he still gets bug bites. I hate putting deet on my kids but living in south Florida that’s the only way to keep these giant mosquitos off my boys. I recommend the wipes with deet if you really want to keep the bugs off.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie M

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: But I don't think its strong enough cause the insects try really fast to hit my skin and as soon as they do they fly away without biting me. They do fly around me trying to find a weak spot.

customer_reviews.title: Works just like they say ...
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a feast for mosquitos so I am always on the lookout for a good repellant. I've used Cutter before but was elated to find these wipes. Not greasy, or sticky, nice mild scent, and work like a charm. Exactly as advertised and after a week in Michigan on a lake, no bites!
customer_reviews.author: C. Myres

customer_reviews.title: Great especially for travel
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by these. They don’t leave your skin feeling greasy or sticky, and they really worked well for keeping mosquitoes and other bugs away! The scent is nice, not really noticeable but definitely didn’t reek of bug spray! I like the idea of wipes better than spray because you know that you covered everything instead of the wind taking it in the other direction. Comes in a resealable bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Raiff

customer_reviews.title: Cutter 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I've tried numerous organic brand products that are so-so just okay I always end up going back to Cutter as this is always a no-fail protection.. plus as a pleasant sent no chemical smell about it dries quickly no residue.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA

customer_reviews.title: Much handier and cleaner than spray.
customer_reviews.text: I find these so much easier than the traditional spray on bugspray which gets everywhere. Yes it still has Deet which means its still really effective. I can easily use a single wipe on a kid and still have some left over for me. I like to keep them handy so if I happen to be out at mosquito time we can wipe down and avoid all those bites. Plus it doesnt end up stinking as much as the spray and it isnt nearly as inconvenient, with accidentally spraying in mouths or elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: G Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Gnat relief
customer_reviews.text: Its gnat season here again and those little bugs make spring miserable. This is what works best for me and my family. It allows me to plant my garden without constantly swatting at those little pests.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Still got multiple bug bites.
customer_reviews.text: They were so easy to use and they didn’t smell that bad. However, I still came home from our camping trip with multiple bug bites..not sure if I just need to run the wipes on me more or what but I was pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. I just wish it would come in individual packages and not all in one package. That would make it easier to carry with you for when the need arises. But it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Repellant Ingenuity
customer_reviews.text: Rather than a spray that goes on unevenly and sticky, or a candle you have to keep an eye on radiating a prominent aroma, we have here repellant wipes without all the mess and stress! Not only does it go on evenly and sticky free, the aroma is much more bearable. It's safe and easy to apply to my toddler, and proven to be very effective for its use. What's more, the packaging is designed for simple access, storage and mobility. It has eye catching information about the product in convient view for access of the user. It's brilliantly designed all the way around and has created an repellant ingenuity!
customer_reviews.author: WreckingGirl

customer_reviews.title: Get the spray
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT individually packed which made it a little more fussy. The scent is much stronger on these wipes than the spray. In the future I will only be buying the spray. But these were good to have on hand in case I ended up staying out later than anticipated, and the mosquitos came out.
customer_reviews.author: jessica pena

customer_reviews.title: Are not individually wrapped
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are fine but I had assumed individually wrapped as then they could be distributed among family members to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B-K

customer_reviews.title: YOU SENT ME EXPIRED PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price. I disliked the expiration date being 02/2020.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worth IT!
customer_reviews.text: This does work yet you have to make sure you evenly coat (no wind during application). The smell is very nice compared to other brands. I would say a family of 4 goes through a bottle in roughly 4-5 uses. Overall, great product and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pineiro Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are heading to Southeast Asia soon and I knew we would need mosquito repellent. We travel light and typically only brin carryons. Since we are limited on liquids, these wipes were absolutely the perfect solution! They smell great too. I can’t speak for the effectiveness yet, but I’m excited to try them. Game changer for travel!
customer_reviews.author: LE Travels | Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Keeps bugs away
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to use and carry around! I loved that I could just throw them in my purse and apply them as needed. I hated that they made my skin very sticky! By the end of the day, my skin had turned blue from collecting lint from my shirt. Also, the smell made me gag a little. It wasn't a very heavy smell so it probably wouldn't bother most people, but I have a sensitive nose. If you want to repel mosquitos what can you do though! I didn't get any bites even though I spent the whole day on a lake in Florida! It did the job!
customer_reviews.author: heatherlovestoread38

customer_reviews.title: No residue or smell leftover
customer_reviews.text: No scent, no film or oil residue either. I feel like I can spray this kind right after I get out of the shower without feeling like I'm covered in gross bug spray.
customer_reviews.author: fay

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Got this before a trip to a tropical climate, since I was bringing only a carry on, I could not throw a bug spray in my bag so this was a great solution to being able to bring bug repellent with me when I was not certain if I would be able to find some where I was traveling (Cuba)
customer_reviews.author: Yasemin Kizil

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre protection.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this other one I found that was baby wipes. So I bought this one thinking it would be the same. I can’t stand the smell of myself, and I definitely don’t feel invisible to mosquitoes. I don’t feel the smell is worth enduring for the protection I get from them so I dread using them. I don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: It keeps the bugs away at a reasonable price and the ease of use
customer_reviews.text: These are so handy I keep them on the back porch. I usually use them for walk with the dog or gardening and stick it on my shoe laces in case I need it while walking
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for travel!
customer_reviews.text: These mosquito wipes are a must-have for travel. Since insect repellant spray is a hazardous material and not allowed on commercial airlines, these wipes are great to keep in your suitcase or carry-on for trips where mosquitos will be a problem. I used two wipes and that covered my arms and legs sufficiently. No sticky feeling and has a very clean, almost unnoticeable scent.
customer_reviews.author: av8ntexn

customer_reviews.title: DON’T ORDER THIS! ITS USED!!!
customer_reviews.text: One star is being nice. DON’T ORDER THIS I REPEAT, DONT ORDER THIS. The bottle is not even full it looks like its been used and they just dump it in a bag! Can’t return bc Amazon says it’s flammable. This is not a new item!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar@Saberfish

customer_reviews.title: Work Well But Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well in terms of reducing mosquito activity in our home and reducing the number of bites, however they do have a strong "insect repellent" scent that lasts for a bit so beware. I warn others in the room when I am about to wipe down with them.
customer_reviews.author: keeshaun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids and travel!
customer_reviews.text: We love these. They are especially great for kids-even young kids (Which was why we initially purchased them)- and for travel since you can carry them on a plane no problem. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I have type O blood & the mosquitos LOVE ME. I’ve tried everything from essential oils to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have type O blood & the mosquitos LOVE ME. I’ve tried everything from essential oils to Avon to everything else and this is the only things that keeps the buggers off of me! And it smells 1/2 way decent too.
customer_reviews.author: kija

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This product actually does work. Very smooth and dry. There was no sign up bugs near or on me, so I assume the repellent worked really really well!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Wipes just ok
customer_reviews.text: I am a mosquito magnet. I bought the wipes version and it was better than nothing, but I still got 2 bites in an evening on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Saved us from some horse flies
customer_reviews.text: Brought to the race track and they saved us from some really aggressive flies and other bugs. The smell is so mild that it didn't bother anyone in the crowds around us. Also since it is wipes instead of the spray it is a little easier to carry them with you.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Family safe!
customer_reviews.text: My son & I always get bit - my son has it the worst with swelling etc. We bought these wipes for a camping trip and let me tell you we NEVER got bit ( 4days). I buy these wipes on the regular now during summer. Safe to use on kids body and face! I highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: desiree

customer_reviews.title: Effective and pleasantly scented
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this same bug spray for years and I love it. I am very prone to mosquito bites and have tried many different sprays. This one is very effective and has a pleasant scent. Definetly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ohnoitsjlo

customer_reviews.title: Great for family
customer_reviews.text: These are great wipes. I usually get bit every time I step outside during the summer & these work wonders. They are not greasy or oily. I have sensitive skin and so does my toddler and they work for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Franceski Jr

customer_reviews.title: At least a quarter is missing from both
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It smells nice and works ok. The bottle says 25% more, but they mean just more bottle, not more spray. Kinda disappointed by it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the little beggars away!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product. It does not feel oily or greasy on the skin, works to keep the bugs away. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Peedy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy anything else for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to have purchased these. It is so fast to use a wipe on our 2 year old she barely has time to throw a tantrum over it. We love how we can wipe down our family of three with one wipe and be on our way. We haven't got any bug bites after using these. They are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Smells & great works great! No mosquitoes can get to this invisible strong field force!  🦟🙅🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: This bug repellent is perfect for everyday use or those long out door trips were pests try to bite the skin off of you.
customer_reviews.author: RenJ

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye spray! Goodbye misqutos!
customer_reviews.text: Bug spray is a must for the kids playing outside, but they dread the spray and gagging on the fumes. This was a great compromise, no more fighting to get them to put bug spray on now. Very effective at keeping misquitos away and they seem to love our kids.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. However I ordered 25% more and the amount in the bottle is missing quite a bit. I feel jipped.
customer_reviews.author: Emersome Angeltoes

customer_reviews.title: These are so amazing to have
customer_reviews.text: These are so amazing to have. They are easy to tuck away and carry around with you and they work just as well as the spray. If you are re-applying often, it really makes a difference to not have all of that spray getting into your face and to not have to breath it in . We just used them on a trip to Bali (where mosquito transmitted diseases are prevalent) and we didn't need to re-apply often. They smell pretty good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Just Us

customer_reviews.title: Love these wipes for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes for adults and kids. Easy to apply, not very messy or sticky, smell is not overpowering, and best of all - they keep the bugs away! Great for travel and on the go because you don't have to worry about any spills or leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I used them in my kids and it works. Does not leave a oily feeling once you use it. I can carry it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy DeRosa

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.text: They don’t leave your skin feeling oily and they smell really good too. And they keep the mosquitoes away!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda V.

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: They are great! They're easy to apply from kids two older adults and they work very well and keep the bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Not Individually Wrapped
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that these were individually wrapped, they are not. It is a pack of 15 together. Great to stuff in your glove box or center console.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice mist, goes on well and kept me bite free during my Zumba class outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Gina De Shrage

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bug Repellant!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes!!! Easy to use and work great. I am a mosquito magnet and I wasn't even bothered by them. Stock up!
customer_reviews.author: dede

customer_reviews.title: when I did use sufficient wipes and went through the pack quickly they were great at keeping the bugs away
customer_reviews.text: one wipe didn't cover a whole child. the pack dried out quickly. that said, when I did use sufficient wipes and went through the pack quickly they were great at keeping the bugs away. Also they're very convenient to carry in the bag when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one star only because I could not do zero stars! This is probably the absolute worse product I have ever bought! We live by the river which naturally brings more bugs. We use bug spray which always helps with the bugs flying up and bites, so I bought these thinking they would work better for the kids. Wrong! They literally attract the moquitos....rub a wipe on your arm and mosquitos are attacking the wipe! Never again...worse money spent!
customer_reviews.author: jcoates

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Good for travel to Ghana, like another reviewer said, add a little water to refresh the towelette and use before tossing, I was concerned about getting malaria and those kept the mosquitoes away
customer_reviews.author: J. H

customer_reviews.title: this product works very well!
customer_reviews.text: My husband attracts mosquitoes where ever he goes. He is not bothered after he wipes down with these wipes..in fact he passes it around to others...goes a long way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these wipes over the spray since I can be sure that all areas of exposed skin are covered thoroughly. And we are not inhaling the spray with each application, which is best for my toddler who can't yet hold her breath. I keep a pack in the car, diaper bag, in my son's baseball bag and at home and use them regularly. None of us have been bit yet these season (as of early July)!
customer_reviews.author: Jen In VB

customer_reviews.title: Did you know Mosquitoes are the deadliest animal on the planet?
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of waking up after being drained of half! of my blood, so ordered this from Amazon and, no more Mosquitoes!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Moore

customer_reviews.title: not worth it, no protection from the bugs
customer_reviews.text: I used on my toddler and he still had mosquitoes bites, didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Brown-lewis

customer_reviews.title: It does Not work on fly’s
customer_reviews.text: It does NOT work on fly’s.. I sprayed it 3 times on me and fly’s continue to land on me!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Z. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: These get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: These are easy and convenient to use if you are just running out the door for a quick walk or trip outdoors. They don’t smell bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Love my shoes

customer_reviews.title: Good for frequent users
customer_reviews.text: While gardening this summer, I used this in place of the higher DEET repellents that I used to use. I have found it to be just as effective and probably safer for everyday use. The smell is better and the pump spray is easier to control, so you do not waste as much.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea but I’m not sure if they work. I used these and bugs started bitting my legs in the areas that I used the wipes. So, 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kymmee

customer_reviews.title: As always great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and definitely helps with repelling those insects.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works and is very easy to use. The smell isn't too strong and the mosquito buzz around you but do not land.
customer_reviews.author: Crafting For Fun

customer_reviews.title: it is what it is,  works well so we will use this as needed when we camp or do yard work
customer_reviews.text: sensitive to strong odors so that is why 4 points for scent
customer_reviews.author: teacherpaula

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant scent and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent on these wipes. They are easy to use and can be shared by two people. They have been effective for me for evening outings.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Mosquitoes away for few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Very useful things to keep mosquitoes away for few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Easy to use and low-odor
customer_reviews.text: Love having these handy whenever I'm traveling and will be outdoors. So easy to just wipe on and be good to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: These things work great!! Was getting bites and put this on and didn’t get one more! Love! Only 15 in a pack but portable
customer_reviews.author: jenduck

customer_reviews.title: Great product for little ones and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Where have these been?? We live in an acre and our patio is always infested w mosquitos. I have been searching for something stronger than all natural but not as strong as some sprays for my 2.5 year old. This is PERFECT. It smells great, and goes on like wipes. I use them now also. Will stock up in summer time when our friends come w their kids to swim.
customer_reviews.author: CorrieFleming

customer_reviews.title: Saved the day!
customer_reviews.text: Repackaged these individually in tiny bags and put in a basket for guests attending an outdoor wedding.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Italy and Rhodes Greece in October. Plenty of mosquitoes around for 17 days and only 5 bites.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes. We use these on our 2 year old, who isn’t the easiest to pin down. They don’t smell as strong as other bug spray.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Not individually wrapped
customer_reviews.text: These come all together like wet wipes. I thought they were individually wrapped. Perhaps partly my fault, but I'm not the only one and the description should be more clear. Also, you can't return them because they are classified as "hazardous material" so I guess I'm stuck with them. I'm sure they will work well, but I would just as soon have had the spray which would have been cheaper and just as effective.
customer_reviews.author: Angelatarangela

customer_reviews.title: Great for the golf bag
customer_reviews.text: Works well and keeps the bugs off. My 5 year old plays golf and I keep a pack in his golf bag. Don’t have to worry about a can spraying inside the golf bag. It’s quick to wipe him down. Doesn’t have the funky bug spray smell either.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED this product. My mosquito wipes came within a few days, packaging was easy to open and the wipes were ready to go! I did a sensitivity test by wiping one over a scratch and the wipe didn't irritate my skin or scratch at all! I'm happy they're resealable so that they can last me till next spring when the bugs are back! 10/10 would reccomend 😇
customer_reviews.author: Heather Brooke

customer_reviews.title: No bites, no stink, I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Smells good!! And doesn't leave my skin feeling "coated". I'll be buying more of this for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Trish K

customer_reviews.title: Saved me this summer
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are awesome. I have been plagued this summer with awful reactions to mosquito bites, and these wipes are easier than spray to apply, don’t smell like anything, don’t make my skin feel oily, and most importantly, keep me from being bit!
customer_reviews.author: Maddison

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and carry in my purse. Also gentle on the skin for my kids. Always have them in my purse for spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: It has a lot of insect repellant on each wipe
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these. The insect repellant is soaked onto the wipe and makes sure that everything gets covered. I love the way it smells and it keeps the bugs off of my kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased multiple times now
customer_reviews.text: I use on myself, my husband, my 2 year old, and 5 month old. Including faces. No breakouts, or reactions of any kind and is GREAT at keeping mosquitos away
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to throw in our bag for sports or any outdoor activities!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wipes smelled good and were not greasy
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a trip to central america and I was trying to pack carry-on items only. The amount of deet was specifically what I was looking for, as I will not use anything that has more than 10-15% (any more than that is not necessary unless you are putting on your clothing, not your skin). The wipes smelled good and were not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: ErinS_04

customer_reviews.title: Great for littles
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my kids. Keeps bugs away but able to control where it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Only works for 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: After applying repellent on dried legs and armes, it worked for 30 minutes and than got 6 mosquito bites. I didn't even finish my coffee and I had to ran away in the house. I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Darko Rozac

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works. Got this so I could pack in carry-on and not have to worry about getting bug spray once I landed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell, decent coverage
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant smell. I think it's impossible to have a nice smell and strong coverage. I bought this because the mosquitoes were so bad in Houston that I was getting bitten while I slept at night. I like this because the smell is light enough that I can wear to bed. I did still get bitten once in awhile but felt better protected with this. I can't speak to how it would hold up out doors.
customer_reviews.author: Edagirl

customer_reviews.title: I’m sold!
customer_reviews.text: These are a godsend. I’m one of those people mosquitos flock to. I used one of these before being outside for several hours on July 4, including the especially treacherous evening hours, and miraculously, I didn’t get a single bite. Take it from this mosquito magnet and buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Davis

customer_reviews.title: It removes the bug from my room
customer_reviews.text: I went in and out of my house frequently. There was one in my room, and I cannot identify it. Using this product not only to shield from that insect, but also removing it from my room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: These work fantastically. I am very bite prone and somewhat allergic to the bites. When wiping one of these on exposed areas of me on a recent trip to Colorado (Silverton, Grand Mesa, and Denver) was completely protected...not one bite. One sheet a day had enough power to cover both my boyfiriend and me. As long as the pkg is sealed after removing a sheet they stay very moist.
customer_reviews.author: Suzyq

product_meta.title: Cutter 95838, 1-Pack, Family Mosquito Wipes, 15-Count
product_meta.description:
Style:Wipes| Size:1-PackIn summertime, life outside is just better. Cutter insect repellents keep your family covered through all of the outdoor fun – so you can soak up some sun without swatting biting bugs. With a range of formulations to choose from, it’s easy to pick the right Cutter product for any outdoor activity, whether you’re lounging at the beach, cheering on your favorite soccer player or just enjoying the backyard. Makes you invisible to bugs. Cutter All Family Mosquito Wipes are soft on skin but tough on bugs. These towelettes are formulated with 7.15 percent DEET formula to repel mosquitoes, including those that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses. Cutter All Family Mosquito Wipes never feel greasy or oily on your skin. The gentle but effective formula also wards off other annoying insects, including ticks, biting flies, gnats, no-see-ums, chiggers and fleas. For outdoor use only. Cutter All Family Mosquito Wipes allow for controlled application of insect repellent to face, ears and neck. Resealable package for multiple outings. Cutter insect repellents have been helping families have fun together outdoors for more than 50 years. Goodbye mosquitoes. Hello, summer!

AMAZON.COM


SOFT ON SKIN, TOUGH ON BUGS
Enjoy soothing protection from mosquitoes, ticks, biting flies, gnats, and more with the Cutter All Family Mosquito Wipes. With a cooling, clean scent, the wipes are soft and pleasant to use, yet still repel mosquitoes for up to two hours. Plus, the wipes are packaged in a resealable pouch, so they won't dry out after opening. 

CERTIFIED SAFE
DEET has been used as an insect repellent in the U.S. for more than 50 years. DEET-based products are recommended by the Centers for Disease Control for effective, long-lasting mosquito protection. According to the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, DEET-based products pose no health concerns as long as they are used according to label directions. 

Cutter wipes can even be used on kids, as the 7.15% DEET formula meets the American Academy of Pediatrics guidelines for use on children ages 2 months and older. 

APPLICATION RECOMMENDATIONS
Use just enough repellent to cover all exposed skin, but apply sparingly to your face, avoiding your eyes and mouth. Avoid cuts, wounds, or irritated skin. Skin reactions to using DEET-based products are rare. When applying to children, do not use Cutter All Family Mosquito Wipes on their hands. Wash your own hands after application, as DEET-based products may damage some synthetic fabrics and materials.

This formula will repel mosquitoes and other biting insects for up to two hours, but coverage length can vary if you get wet or if you're sweating excessively. Reapply if you are noticing mosquito activity around you again. You can use Cutter All Family Mosquito Wipes and sunscreen at the same time. Apply the sunscreen first, and then apply the insect repellent.
feature_bullets: REPELS MOSQUITOES: 7.15 percent DEET formula repels mosquitoes, including those that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses.
SOFT ON SKIN, TOUGH ON BUGS: Towelettes allow controlled application to face, ears and neck for mosquito protection on sensitive areas.
NOT GREASY OR OILY: Light, clean feel on the skin with a pleasant scent.
REPELS MOSQUITOES, TICKS, GNATS, BITING FLIES, CHIGGERS & FLEAS: Create a barrier against annoying bugs that can spoil the outdoors.
15 TOWELETTES: Convenient resealable packet helps keep towelette s moist.
Convenient wipes allow controlled application on faces, ears and necks
